verses.roman:
sthūla ei pañca doṣa, pañca alaṅkāra
sūkṣma vicāriye yadi āchaye apāra

synonyms: sthūla—gross; ei—these; pañca—five; doṣa—faults; pañca—five; alaṅkāra—literary ornaments; sūkṣma—in detail; vicāriye—we consider; yadi—if; āchaye—there are; apāra—unlimited.
translation: "I have simply discussed the five gross faults and five literary embellishments of this verse, but if we consider it in fine detail we will find unlimited faults.
